column2: You leave the club with your lover and head to your wedding venue.
You both dress up in wedding dresses and exchange a long embrace.
The bridesmaids meet you there and celebrate your new matrimony.
You both vow to love, cherish, and take care of each other forever.
You exchange wedding rings and a long and wonderful French kiss.
With cheers and applauses, you're officially declared wife and wife.
The wedding party starts, and everyone seems to have a good time.
It doesn't take very long until the bridesmaids get in tight bondage.
Friends and members from the Bondage Club congratulate you both.
Later, you go to a bondage dungeon to celebrate your honeymoon.
You and your wife enjoy a romantic and kinky moment together.
After lots of sex and BDSM, you head back to your private room.
